main_definition: Howard can refer to a surname, an idiomatic expression in the context of American basketball culture, or as a shortened form of names.

meanings_and_examples.example: Brian Howard is a common English name.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Basketball idiom meaning excellent performance or skill in the sport
meanings_and_examples.example: Howard was on fire during that game, scoring point after point with incredible agility and precision.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Shortened form of names including Warwick (War-hick), William (William Howard), or others containing 'how' in their spelling
meanings_and_examples.example: Howard Johnson was a popular name among the 19th-century American immigrants.
